string_cmd: head to the sofa, grab a cleanser you find there, and bring it back to me
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='sofa'), PickObject(action='pick_object', object_to_pick='cleanser'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='start_location'), GiveObject(action='give_object')]

string_cmd: pick up a strawberry from the kitchen table and give it to the person standing in the office
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='kitchen table'), PickObject(action='pick_object', object_to_pick='strawberry'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='office'), FindPerson(action='find_person', attribute_value='standing person'), GiveObject(action='give_object')]

string_cmd: find someone lying down in the office and escort them to the dishwasher
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='office'), FindPerson(action='find_person', attribute_value='lying person'), GuidePersonTo(action='guide_person_to', destination_room='dishwasher')]

string_cmd: find a sugar in the living room, take it, and set it down on the desk
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='living room'), PickObject(action='pick_object', object_to_pick='sugar'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='desk'), PlaceObject(action='place_object')]

string_cmd: go to the bathroom, find Jane, and follow her
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='bathroom'), FindPersonByName(action='find_person_by_name', name='Jane'), FollowPersonUntil(action='follow_person_until', destination='canceled')]

string_cmd: count the drinks on the tv stand and report the number to me
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='tv stand'), Count(action='count', target_to_count='drinks'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='start_location'), SayWithContext(action='say_with_context', user_instruction='count the drinks on the tv stand and report the number to me', previous_command_info=['count'])]

string_cmd: report how many people are standing in the living room
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='living room'), Count(action='count', target_to_count='standing persons'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='start_location'), SayWithContext(action='say_with_context', user_instruction='tell me how many standing persons are in the living room', previous_command_info=['count'])]

string_cmd: observe and tell me what gesture the person near the waste basket is making
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='waste basket'), FindPerson(action='find_person', attribute_value=''), GetPersonInfo(action='get_person_info', info_type='gesture'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='start_location'), SayWithContext(action='say_with_context', user_instruction='tell me the gesture of the person at the waste basket', previous_command_info=['get_person_info'])]

string_cmd: identify the thinnest object on the bed and tell me what it is
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='bed'), GetVisualInfo(action='get_visual_info', measure='thinnest', object_category='object'), GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='start_location'), SayWithContext(action='say_with_context', user_instruction='tell me what is the thinnest object on the bed', previous_command_info=['get_visual_info'])]

string_cmd: tell the person pointing left in the office what day it will be tomorrow
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='office'), FindPerson(action='find_person', attribute_value='person pointing to the left'), SayWithContext(action='say_with_context', user_instruction='tell what day is tomorrow to the person pointing to the left in the office', previous_command_info=['what day is tomorrow'])]

string_cmd: respond to the quiz from the person who has their left arm raised in the living room
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='living room'), FindPerson(action='find_person', attribute_value='person raising their left arm'), AnswerQuestion(action='answer_question')]

string_cmd: track Paris as they move from the sink to the office
structured_cmd: [GoTo(action='go_to', location_to_go='sink'), FindPersonByName(action='find_person_by_name', name='Paris'), FollowPersonUntil(action='follow_person_until', destination='office')]
